Objectives: Contribute to building large scale applications for organizations and companies who make a difference in peoples lives. Work with driven individuals who are interested in excelling at what they do.

Strenghts: Strong communications skills in english and french. Ability to work under stress. Teamwork. Determination.


Skills


Angular Amazon Web Services ASP.Net Bitbucket Bootstrap CSS C# D3 Drupal Express Git Heroku html/CSS Jekyll JavaScript jQuery Meteor MongoDB MsSQL MySQL Node.js Obective-C Passbook PostgreSQL Quality Assurance React Ruby SVN Swift Team Foundation Linux Visual Basic Visual Studio WET Wordpress Windows Server

Personal projects and learning

Build Node.js and Express applications backed by MySQL and MongoDB. Build Meteor websites with React and Angular2. Build Drupal and Wordpress websites for clients and Corporate websites. Build Ruby/Sinatra CSS element scrapper. Build an Angular, CSV parser. Build RoR blog with a PostgreSQL database. Build various one page html/CSS websites for clients. Build Jekyll static blogs and websites. Learn D3.js. Run many AWS instances on Linux AMI's, or Windows Server AMI's, create really persistant RDS instances for iOS application programing interfaces. Deploy applications with Heroku. Use Git and SVN as versioning tools. Take many courses on Lynda.com.

Experience

Web Application Developer
Ottawa Hospital Research Institute

June 2015 - present

Develop and Design Web Applications to support research activities with ASP.NET using C# and Visual Basic with Visual Studio. Develop web applications for: Research Grants, Peer Review and Decision Aid with data access through MsSQL databases. Deploy applications to Windows Server. Create mobile ready websites and templates using Bootstrap CSS framework. Build user interface controls using Javascript and jQuery. Develop Passbook app for special events and seminars by designing the pass and building a Ruby/Sinatra API capable of distributing and updating passes. Manage versioning with SVN.

Web Support Analyst
Canada School of Public Service

December 2014 - May 2015

Develop ASP.NET and Drupal websites for the Canada School of Public Service in accordance with Web Standards for the Government of Canada (GOC). Migrate Classic ASP website to ASPX/ Visual Basic with the Web-Experience Toolkit (Bootstrap CSS) developed by the GOC. Build a Drupal engagement forum for the managers community and deploy in AWS EBS and EC2 Linux, Apache, MySQL, PhP, environments. Participate in the QA phase of the migration. Manage code and versioning with Visual Studio Team Foundation Server.

Branch Coordinator
Canada Border Services Agency

May 2011 - December 2014

Test and Develop Drupal as a space planning application. Prepare test cases and QA reports for the application. Coordinate moves and special projects: major moves of up to 1600 persons, A/V Solutions, projects based on security requirements, business restructurations, office fit-ups, purchase and procure office furniture. Create and update branch project plans. Provide advice and prepare proposals for space planning. Ensure compliance with PWGSC Workspace 2.0 fit-up standards. Create communication products for senior management.

Programs Administrator
Public Service Commission

September 2010 - April 2011

Administer various program websites: Federal Student Work Experience Program, Co-op and Research Affiliate Program. Perform various actions related to staffing of student positions: database queries for potential candidates, present potential candidates, advise on human resources policies, log and track staffing actions.

Human Resources Assistant
Public Service Commission

May 2010 - August 2011

Ensure all stages of selection processes are completed by producing and updating board reports, scheduling competency and language evaluations and communicating results to candidates. Produce reports and update canditate profiles in SAP records management system.

Bike and XC Ski Mecanic and Technician
Greg Christie's Ski and Cycleworks

Aug 2007 - May 2010

Repair high performance bicycles, wax and prepare high performance skis for athletes and clients. Order parts and accessories. Help with sales and custommer service.
